title: The Hero Suddenly Proposed to Me, but… (LN) - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Average-looking Protagonist   Blackmail   Demon Lord   Determined Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Human Weapon   Lack of Common Sense   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Maids   Male Yandere   Mob Protagonist   Nobles   Possessive Characters   Spirits   Timid Protagonist
author: Togashi Seiya   富樫聖夜
description:
Having rescued the beautiful princess who was kidnapped by the Demon King, the Hero’s party returns. That Hero, the King said, could take any reward. As everybody expected, the Hero said. “I love you.” Taking my hand, the princess’s maidー But I’m a mob character!?

This is about a maid with a predisposition to retort [tsukkomi] and the history’s strongest Hero, a promise of disregarding a new sense of fantasy romantic comedy.>
